definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: City Planning Board for planning permission and acceptance without formalities.
sentences.chinese: 其中市规划局将不予为其办理规划许可和验收手续。

sentences.english: This reporter recently received information from the City Planning Board.
sentences.chinese: 这是记者近日从市规划局获得的信息。

sentences.english: The specific areas shall be delimited by the Municipal City Planning Bureau together with the Municipal Greening Administration.
sentences.chinese: 具体范围由市规划局会同市绿化局划定。

sentences.english: Nanjing test tubes anchored in the Urban Planning Bureau, Office of the relevant Chu Shi.
sentences.chinese: 南京市测管办挂靠在市规划局相关处室。

sentences.english: So when we applied for planning permission we were expecting it to be turned down.
sentences.chinese: 其中市规划局将不予为其办理规划许可和验收手续。

sentences.english: Particulars shall be subject to the approval documents "Planning and Siting Opinions" issued by Jinshan District Planning Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 具体以金山区规划局“规划选址意见书”批文为准。

definition: environment protection office/PRC National bureau of environmental protection
public security bureau (government office similar in function to a police station)
administrative committee/management committee/abbr. for 管理委員會|管理委员会[guan3 li3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]
City Urban Administrative and Law Enforcement Bureau (PRC)
